entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:01 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
